title: Booking
description: Booking details collected from booking form

BookingId.description: The unique identifier for a product

FULLNAME.description: Name of the Customer who have done booking

Checkin.description: Date when the customer wants to enter the hotel

Checkout.description: Date when the customer wants to exit the hotel

NoofRooms.description: No of Rooms such that customer wants to book

NoofAdults.description: No of Adults staying at hotel

NoofChild.description: No of Child staying at hotel

Email.description: Email of the customer who wants to book

Phone.description: Phone no of customer who is booking the hotel
